string.value: Add this website as Default website to your Profile.

string.name: test setup
string.value: Check you Microphone and Camera setup before you enter a room by recording some seconds. You can then replay your recording to check your voice and picture.

string.name: test setup
string.value: You may proceed without testing if you do not plan to publish your voice or picture. Participants without Audio or Video can still use the Whiteboard, share their Desktop or write Chat messages.

string.name: test setup
string.value: Do not show Audio / Video Test (Recording) before entering a Conference

string.name: overview room
string.value: Public Rooms are accessible for all Users.

string.name: Private Rooms
string.value: Private Rooms are only accessible for users of the same organization.

string.name: overview room
string.value: Rooms in this section are created for personal usage. They are created through the calendar and have a start and a end date. They are only listed in this section as long as they are valid.

string.name: restricted room
string.value: You have to be moderator to do this.

string.name: error message soap secure login
string.value: This Session Hash was already used. You cannot use it twice.

string.name: conference view
string.value: Do you really want to exit? You might should clear uploaded documents, whiteboard and the chat history.

string.name: main menu
string.value: Choose a room for a meeting

string.name: calendar
string.value: There is an unsaved Event in the Calendar. Please either save it or remove it.

string.name: calendar
string.value: Please add at least one attendee for your meeting!

string.name: calendar
string.value: Do you really want to delete this Event?

string.name: dashboard
string.value: OpenMeetings, your Web Conferencing Platform. Either follow the Instructions, press the start button to start to conference immediatelly or you goto the Calendar and set up a Conference for the future.

string.name: lzcalendar
string.value:
To set up a conference you can add a new Event in the Calendar. For each Calendar Event there will be automatically a Conference Room created. You and every attendee will get an Email with a Link to the room.

You can choose between different room types that have different layouts and moderation systems. You can also choose between different notification types for the EMail that is send for every Calendar Event.

string.name: lzcalendar
string.value: There is no User selected. Please select an item from the list first and then hit add.

string.name: room admin
string.value: If the Room is moderated, User with Level Moderator or Administrator are automatically Moderator if they enter the Room. If you don't want to specify that and only want a certain User to become Moderator use the Default Moderator option.

string.name: room admin
string.value: A Super Moderator is always a Moderator when he enters a Room, and nobody can remove the Moderation Flag from him

string.name: room admin
string.value: If you add an Organization to the room only users of that Organization have access to it (This is only valid if the isPublic flag is set to false!)

string.name: confirm delete
string.value: Do you really want to delete this Item? You have to press the save button to store the changes!

string.name: user choose error
string.value: There is no User selected. Please select first before you add it!

string.name: room admin
string.value: Do you want to add the Super Moderation Flag for this User? A Super Moderator is not only Moderator of a Room, but also no other Moderator can remove the Moderation Flag for this User. You need to save the Room Object to save these settings!

string.name: room admin
string.value: Do you want to remove the Super Moderation Flag for this User? You need to save the Room Object to save these settings!

string.name: super moderator
string.value: This User is a Super-Moderator. You cannot remove the Moderation flag from a Super-Moderator!

string.name: confirm delete
string.value: Do you really want to delete this File/Folder?
